information:
FREE Yoga Event at Aspire Ladies Club on 21st June!

Celebrate International Yoga Day with Aspire Active on the 21st June at 9PM!
International Yoga Day is a community conscious event featuring fun and flowing yoga asana classes, deep relaxation and yoga breathing. International Day of Yoga aims to raise the worldwide awareness of the many benefits of yoga.Yoga is an ancient, holistic approach to health and wellbeing that promotes harmony between individuals, their community, their natural environment and
the wider world.
The asanas of yoga can increase your flexibility, strengthen and muscle tone, whilst balancing hormones, cleansing and flushing the internal systems of your body. Leaving you with a calm mind and reduced level of stress.
The evening will be hosted by our leading yoga teachers as we celebrate a full day of yoga.
It is a great opportunity to introduce someone new to yoga, so why not bring along friends and family for a great evening of yoga.
Book your spot here: https://www.facebook.com/AspireActive/
For more information: Call 4413 6434.  Aspire Ladies Club is located at Aspire Zone. Follow FB&IG: @AspireActive

2017-06-18

information:
Five star luxury at QAR 25 per hour – Eid Al Fitr Staycation – Oryx Rotana


Celebrate the end of Ramadan with family and friends in a fabulous 30 hours getaway at Oryx Rotana Doha!
Eid Al Fitr package is QAR 25 per hour including:

Early check in between 11:00 AM and 1:00 PM
Late check out between 5:00 PM and 7:00 PM
Buffet breakfast at Choices
Buffet Lunch OR Dinner at Choices
25% discount on additional Food and Beverage
Kids activities from 12:00 PM until 6:00 PM
50% discount on massage at Bodylines
Book an extra night or connecting room
for the kids for QAR 399 room only

QAR 25 per hour*
ONLY QAR 750 for the whole 30 hour staycation for two adults and two kids!

Summer Splash Down At Oyster Bay

DJ performances from 12:00 to 18:00 (Wednesday to Saturday)
